name: Keep It Alive. Keep It Fed.
name_original: Keep It Alive. Keep It Fed.
description:
Ludum Dare 46 - Keep it alive

You're flying your spaceship through the rings of a far off planet when your reactor starts to melt down. You need to collect resources from the belt to keep your reactor alive and running long enough to get somewhere to get repairs.

WASD and mouse to move, E to pick up and interact. 
Gamepads might work but never tested.
